name: forumone/code-quality
description: Code quality tools for enforcing standards and practices within Drupal projects.

suggest.drupal/coder: Adds coding standards for Drupal projects.
suggest.mglaman/phpstan-drupal: Adds PHPStan configuration for Drupal projects.
suggest.mglaman/phpstan-drupal-deprecations: PHPStan configuration to scan for Drupal deprecations.
